definition.text: Before I leave you with the next tutorial, you must know that Superalgos is a crypto project with distributed governance!

paragraphs.text: You may earn Superalgos SA Tokens and Reputation by contributing to the project.
Then you may leverage your tokens and reputation to participate in Governance Programs.
Participating in governance earns you more tokens, as helping direct the project is an important contribution in and of itself!
You may earn your first few tokens with the Airdrops Program just by setting up your User Profile. But before you do that, you need to do a couple more tutorials to complete your education!
